item.title: Git Folder Structure and Naming Conventions
item.description: Recently at work, I ran into one of those once-in-a-while git issues that generally end up being solved with creative Googling and git magic. This time, though, I wanted to understand a little more about how git works. The problem I was developing a new feature with a colleague, so we had two branches going that we were rebasing against each other as we went. feature-name/my-branch feature-name/his-branch At some point, we decided it was time to merge our branches into one consolidated effort.
